description: This file defines the main application component for a React frontend. It sets up routing for different pages such as login, registration, restaurant listings, details, checkout, and order success, including private routes that require authentication. It also includes provider components for authentication and cart context, as well as a navigation bar.

classes.name: PrivateRoute
classes.description: A wrapper component that renders its children if the user is authenticated; otherwise redirects to the login page.

methods.name: PrivateRoute({ children })
methods.description: Component that enforces authentication before rendering children.

methods.name: App()
methods.description: Main application component that sets up routing with context providers and navigation.
